headline: Ask HN: Why dont websites use _blank for external links anymore?
description:
Was it always like this? I find myself right clicking > new tabbing for every link now. Not to mention that the problem is exacerbated by “enhanced” js scrolling.

Some HN links from just today that do it https://fullstackeconomics.com/why-america-cant-build-big-things-any-more/

https://patrickcollison.com/fast

https://gankra.github.io/blah/fix-rust-pointers/

https://gashamola.com/2022/03/16/the-elephant-in-the-event-loop.html

And just for a nice change here’s a link that acts as you would expect

https://migrant.substack.com/p/how-google-fi-suddenly-struck?s=r
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么网站不再使用_blank来做外部链接了？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼網站不再使用_blank來做外部鏈接了？
description_zh-Hans:
它总是这样吗？我发现自己现在对每个链接都是右键点击>；新标签。更不用说这个问题因 "增强型 "js滚动而变得更加严重。

今天的一些HN链接也是如此 https://fullstackeconomics.com/why-america-cant-build-big-things-any-more/

https://patrickcollison.com/fast

https://gankra.github.io/blah/fix-rust-pointers/

https://gashamola.com/2022/03/16/the-elephant-in-the-event-loop.html

而只是为了一个很好的改变，这里有一个链接，它的行为是你所期望的

https://migrant.substack.com/p/how-google-fi-suddenly-struck?s=r
description_zh-Hant:
它總是這樣嗎？我發現自己現在對每個鏈接都是右鍵點擊>；新標籤。更不用說這個問題因 "增強型 "js滾動而變得更加嚴重。

今天的一些HN鏈接也是如此 https://fullstackeconomics.com/why-america-cant-build-big-things-any-more/

https://patrickcollison.com/fast

https://gankra.github.io/blah/fix-rust-pointers/

https://gashamola.com/2022/03/16/the-elephant-in-the-event-loop.html

而只是為了一個很好的改變，這裡有一個鏈接，它的行為是你所期望的

https://migrant.substack.com/p/how-google-fi-suddenly-struck?s=r
